item.description:
VISION BOARD WORKSHOP



SATURDAY JUNE 28th at 1:00 p.m. to 4:00 p.m.



The Secret reveals the most powerful law in the universe. The knowledge of this law has run like a golden thread through the lives and the teachings of all the prophets and through the lives of all truly great men and women.



All that they have ever accomplished or attained has been done in full accordance with this most powerful law

~ The Law of Attraction.



This workshop is being taught by Lauren DiBiase who has been a student of team building, personal development and leadership training for the last 15 years. Ms. DiBiase holds a Masters Degree in Mental Health Counseling and is a Certified Coach. In addition, she has been working with Bob Proctor, (a featured expert in the movie, ?The Secret,?) and his teachings for many years. Currently, she is licensed to represent his organization and training material.



Lauren?s passion in life is to share from the heart in a way that can help others unlock their true desires and to stand by them as they discover their unique path to abundance.



Please pre-register for this event at

(978) 762-0454 or osanna.inc@verizon.net
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the door. Please RSVP asap this will book FAST!
